references.reason: This book is a foundational text in reinforcement learning, providing the theoretical background and algorithms crucial to understanding the paper's approach.

The paper builds upon the Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO) algorithm, a key method in reinforcement learning for stable policy optimization, which is a core component of the proposed RC-PPO algorithm.

references.paper_title: A time-dependent hamilton-jacobi formulation of reachable sets for continuous dynamic games
references.reason: This paper introduces the Hamilton-Jacobi (HJ) reachability theory, which is fundamental to the paper's approach of converting the minimum-cost reach-avoid problem into a reachability problem.
The paper addresses the constrained optimization problem inherent in the minimum-cost reach-avoid problem, which the proposed RC-PPO method directly tackles.

references.paper_title: Safety and liveness guarantees through reach-avoid reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper presents a reinforcement learning method for solving reach-avoid problems, which the current paper adapts and extends to address the minimum-cost reach-avoid problem.
